scripts.setup: npm install && cd blockchain && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../web && npm install
scripts.deploy: cd blockchain && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.js --network localhost
scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n "CHAIN,DEPLOY,BACKEND,WEB" -c "blue,green,magenta,cyan" "npm run chain" "wait-on tcp:8545 && npm run deploy && npm run backend" "wait-on tcp:8545 && wait-on file:web/config.json && npm run frontend"
